title: Reimburse DAO expenses #2
body:
Reimburse DAO expenses #2

Proposed by [@monet-supply](https://twitter.com/MonetSupply).

### Background

[@mubaris](https://twitter.com/0xmubaris) has deployed the PastaDAO governance contracts and incentive distribution mechanism as specified in the previous grant proposal [here](). Deployment of the contracts required a decent amount of gas expenses, which I feel should be reimbursed by the DAO.

Deployment expenses include the following transactions:

- [PastaDAO token](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x7fdc7c4aca240d55124a759b43613105202203d965cb6437b6247ecd22b053e5): 0.2814 ETH
- [Governor](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x31da7323fda41d8b255c7fb4d7599c2c6242beff774be5cb4d77abcf467fc331): 0.4626 ETH
- [Timelock](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x9a6269634bfcff0482607112ef8789ab808d14c8841392565824320485e5cc9f): 0.1681 ETH
- [PastaChef Liquidity Incentivizer](https://etherscan.io/tx/0xd55af0bbeb34e4675f70190b2b16759aad5a1641e01d48061633acb47b70c359): 0.1245 ETH

Total: 1.0366 ETH

### Proposal

Based on current [PASTA/ETH](https://info.uniswap.org/pair/0xE92346d9369Fe03b735Ed9bDeB6bdC2591b8227E) liquidity proportions, the market value is roughly 12,700 PASTA per ETH.

I propose the DAO disburse 13,165 PASTA to mubaris to reimburse the above listed expenses.

### Next Steps

If this proposal is approved by voters, the [PastaDAO multisig]() will be authorized to transfer the sum shown above to mubaris. 

### Proposal Question

Do you approve this expense reimbursement and funds transfer?
author: 0x8d07D225a769b7Af3A923481E1FdF49180e6A265
